statements: SELECT id, credit_score, income, loan_amount, employment_status, years_employed FROM loan_default_prediction;
SELECT credit_score, income, employment_status FROM loan_default_prediction WHERE years_employed > 5;
SELECT * FROM loan_default_prediction WHERE credit_score < 600;
SELECT id, income, years_employed FROM loan_default_prediction WHERE employment_status = 'Full Time' ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT credit_score, loan_amount FROM loan_default_prediction WHERE employment_status = 'Part Time' AND income > 50000;
SELECT credit_score, income FROM loan_default_prediction WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY credit_score DESC, income ASC
SELECT * FROM loan_default_prediction WHERE employment_status = 'Full-Time' AND years_employed >= 5 ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT id, loan_amount, employment_status FROM loan_default_prediction WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 700 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT credit_score, income, years_employed FROM loan_default_prediction WHERE employment_status = 'Part-Time' AND income > 50000 ORDER BY years_employed ASC, credit_score DESC
SELECT id, loan_amount, employment_status FROM loan_default_prediction WHERE income < 30000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC, employment_status ASC
SELECT * FROM CreditHistory
SELECT user_id, credit_score FROM CreditHistory WHERE credit_score > 700
SELECT user_id, loan_amount FROM CreditHistory ORDER BY loan_amount DESC
SELECT user_id, payment_history FROM CreditHistory WHERE payment_history LIKE '%late%'
SELECT user_id, income, expenses, savings FROM FinancialData WHERE income > expenses
SELECT * FROM CreditHistory WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, credit_score, loan_amount FROM CreditHistory WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT * FROM CreditHistory ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, loan_duration, payment_history FROM CreditHistory WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT user_id, income, expenses, employment_status FROM FinancialData WHERE employment_status = 'Employed';
SELECT * FROM Loan_Default_Prediction LIMIT 10;
SELECT loan_id, credit_score, default_likelihood FROM Loan_Default_Prediction WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT loan_id, income, loan_amount FROM Loan_Default_Prediction WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM Credit_History ORDER BY late_payments DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, income, debt FROM Financial_Data WHERE savings > income;
SELECT loan_id, credit_score, income FROM Loan_Default_Prediction WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, credit_limit FROM Credit_History WHERE late_payments > 3 ORDER BY credit_limit ASC;
SELECT customer_id, income, expenses, savings, debt FROM Financial_Data WHERE income > 50000 AND expenses < 30000;
SELECT loan_id, credit_score, income, loan_amount, default_likelihood FROM Loan_Default_Prediction WHERE default_likelihood < 0.1;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, credit_limit, late_payments FROM Credit_History WHERE credit_score < 600 AND late_payments > 0 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM borrowers;
SELECT borrower_id, name, address FROM borrowers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT borrower_id, credit_score FROM borrowers WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000 AND interest_rate < 0.05;
SELECT borrower_id, investments FROM financial_data ORDER BY investments DESC;
SELECT name, address FROM borrowers;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE interest_rate > 5;
SELECT borrower_id, income FROM borrowers ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT loans.loan_id, loans.loan_amount, borrowers.name FROM loans JOIN borrowers ON loans.borrower_id = borrowers.borrower_id;
SELECT credit_id, borrower_id, late_payments, missed_payments FROM credit_history WHERE credit_limit > 10000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT user_id, name, email, credit_score FROM users ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount >= 5000;
SELECT loan_id, user_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000 AND loan_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments JOIN loans ON payments.loan_id = loans.loan_id WHERE payments.payment_amount > 500 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;

SELECT users.name, credit_history.credit_rating, financial_data.income FROM users JOIN credit_history ON users.user_id = credit_history.user_id JOIN financial_data ON users.user_id = financial_data.user_id WHERE credit_history.credit_limit > 50000;
